name: Space-Age-Without-Platforms
author: thesixthroc
title: No Space Platforms
description:
Removes space platforms from the game. Rockets fire cargo pods directly at other planets.

Cargo landing pads possess one logistic requesting group per planet, so a simplified space logistics proceeds like normal. Note that the orange ‘on the way’ coloration on requests is delayed until the cargo pod has finished ascending from the fulfilling surface.
